Hab nwg has tas, “Tav lawm! Kuv yog Alafas hab yog Aumenkas, kuv yog lub hauvpaug hab kuv yog lub ntsis. Kuv yuav pub cov dlej kws haus muaj txujsa huv lub qhovdlej txhawv rua tug kws nqhes dlej haus, kuv pub dlawb dlawb xwb, tsi yuav nqe le.
Kuv yuav ua txhua tug kws kovyeej lawm tug Vaajtswv, hab puab yuav ua kuv cov tub.

Tabsis cov tuabneeg sab yau, cov tuabneeg ntxeev sab, cov tuabneeg nyam ua phem ua qas, cov tuabneeg tua tuabneeg, cov tuabneeg ua kev nkauj kev nraug, cov tuabneeg ua khawvkoob, cov tuabneeg pe dlaab pe mlom hab cov tuabneeg dlaag, puab txhua tug yuav poob rua huv cov nplaim tawg leejfaaj kws cig ntswj pis yog kws yog txujkev tuag zag ob. Qhov chaw ntawd yog qhov chaw kws tub xub tu tseg ca rua puab lawm.”

Xyaa tug timtswv ceebtsheej kws nqaa xyaa lub taig kws rau xyaa yaam sub tawg sub ntshaa puv nkaus, ib tug lug has rua kuv has tas, “Koj nrug kuv moog saib tug Nkauj Nyaab kws yog tug Mivnyuas Yaaj tug quaspuj.”

Vaaj Ntsujplig lug kaav taagnrho kuv lub sab, ces tug timtswv ntawd coj kuv nce moog sau ib lub ncov roob sab sab. Nwg taw teg qha lub nroog Yeluxalees rua kuv saib, yog lub Nroog Dlawbhuv kws taabtom lug ntawm Vaajtswv tug kws nyob sau ntuj lug,

hab Vaajtswv tug tshwjchim ci ntsaa ab huv lub nroog ntawd tuaj. Lub nroog ntawd ci ntsaa ab ib yaam le lub qai zeb ci ci kws muaj nqes hu ua manixaus; lub qai zeb ntawd pum kev tshaab plawg ib yaam le dlaim av.

Lub nroog ntawd muaj tug ntsaa yeej luj luj hab sab sab thaiv, muaj kaum ob lub roojvaag hab muaj kaum ob tug timtswv ceebtsheej ib tug zuv ntawm ib lub roojvaag. Luas sau cov Yixalayees kaum ob xeem tej npe rua ntawm cov roojvaag ntawd.
Ib saab ntsaa yeej muaj peb lub roojvaag: saab nubtuaj muaj peb lub, saab qaabteb muaj peb lub, saab qaumteb muaj peb lub, hab saab nubpoob muaj peb lub.
Luas muab kaum ob lub pobzeb kws muaj tug Mivnyuas Yaaj kaum ob tug timthawj npe sau rua lug tag tug taw loog kws xov lub nroog ntawd.
Tug timtswv kws has lug rua kuv ntawd coj ib tug paas ntsuag kws yog kub, nwg yuav ntsuag lub nroog, tej roojvaag hab tug ntsaa yeej.
Lub nroog ntawd ua xwmfaab xwmmeem. Tug timtswv muab nwg tug paas ntsuag lub nroog, qhov ntev muaj ob txheeb plaub puas kilumev, qhov dlaav hab qhov sab ntev ib yaam nkaus.
Tug timtswv ntsuag tug ntsaa yeej hab, qhov sab  muaj ib puas plaub caug plaub tshim, lawv le tej paas ntsuag kws tuabneeg ibtxwm ntsuag.
Tug ntsaa yeej ntawd yog muab tej qai zeb ci ci kws npe hu ua manixaus lug ua, hab lub nroog yog muab cov tseem kub kws pum kev tshaab plawg le av lug ua.

Tug taw tag tug ntsaa yeej yog muab pobzeb ua, hab muab txhua yaam qai zeb ci ci kws muaj nqes lug lu rua kuas tug ntsaa yeej zoo nkauj. Thawj ntu taw ntsaa yeej yog qai zeb manixaus, ntu ob yog qai zeb xafiles, ntu peb yog qai zeb maulas hab ntu plaub yog qai zeb emelas,

ntu tsib yog qai zeb aunis, ntu rau yog qai zeb kanelis, ntu xyaa yog qai zeb npulakas, ntu yim yog qai zeb npelis, ntu cuaj yog qai zeb tupas, ntu kaum yog qai zeb khixupas, ntu kaum ib yog qai zeb yaxees, hab ntu kaum ob yog qai zeb amathis.
Kaum ob lub roojvaag ntawd yog muab kaum ob lub hlaws muaj nqes ua. Tej kev kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd luas muab cov tseem kub kws pum kev tshaaj plawg ib yaam le av lug ua.
Kuv tsi pum muaj ib lub tuamtsev nyob huv lub nroog ntawd le, rua qhov tug Tswv kws yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj Fwjchim Luj kawg nkaus hab tug Mivnyuas Yaaj yog lub tuamtsev ntaag.
Huv lub nroog ntawd tsi muaj nub lossis hli ci, rua qhov Vaajtswv tug tshwjchim yeej ci ntsaa ab tuaj rua huv, hab tug Mivnyuas Yaaj yog lub teeb kws ci rua suavdlawg pum kev.
Txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav pum kev kaaj nrig moog moog lug lug, hab tej vaajntxwv kws nyob huv nplajteb yuav nqaa puab tej nyaj tej kub hab tej qhov txhua chaw tuaj rua huv lub nroog.
Lub nroog ntawd tej roojvaag qheb lug ca tsi kaw le, rua qhov nyob huv lub nroog ntawd yeej tsi txawj tsaus ntuj.
Txhua tsaav tuabneeg yuav coj puab tej fwjchim hab puab tej meejmom tuaj rua huv lub nroog.

Tabsis yuav tsi muaj tej kev phem kev qas, tej kev poob ntsejmuag lossis tej tuabneeg dlaag nyob huv lub nroog ntawd le, luas tsuas pub cov tuabneeg kws tub muaj npe sau ca rua huv tug Mivnyuas Yaaj phoo ntawv kws sau cov tuabneeg kws muaj sa ntev moog ibtxhis lawm tej npe moog nyob huv lub nroog ntawd xwb.
Tug timtswv ceebtsheej kws qha tug dlej cawm sav kws ci pum kev tshaab plawg le dlaim av rua kuv. Tug dlej ntawd ndlwg sau Vaajtswv hab tug Mivnyuas Yaaj lub zwmtxwv lug,

hab ndlwg taug txujkev huv plawv nroog. Ob saab ntug dlej puavleej muaj tsob txiv ntoo cawm sav kws ib xyoos twg txi kaum ob phaum txiv, ib hlis twg txi ib phaum. Tsob ntoo ntawd tej nplooj yog hauv tshuaj kuab muaj tsuas kws khu tau txhua tsaav tuabneeg.
Yeej tsi muaj tej kws Vaajtswv foom tsi zoo rua lawm nyob huv lub nroog ntawd hlo le. Vaajtswv hab tug Mivnyuas Yaaj lub zwmtxwv yuav nyob huv lub nroog ntawd, hab nwg cov tubkhai yuav pehawm nwg.
Puab yuav pum nwg lub ntsejmuag, hab nwg yuav sau nwg lub npe rua ntawm puab hauvplaj.

Yuav tsi muaj mo ntuj le lawm, puab yuav tsi taws teeb hab tsi taag yuav muaj tshaav ntuj, rua qhov tug Tswv kws yog Vaajtswv yuav ci rua puab pum kev, hab puab yuav ua vaajntxwv kaav lub nroog ntawd moog ibtxhis le.

Tom qaab ntawd tug timtswv has rua kuv has tas, “Tej lug nuav yog lug tseeb kws tso sab tau. Hab tug Tswv kws yog Vaajtswv tug kws muab nwg tug Ntsujplig rua cov cev Vaajtswv lug, tau khaiv nwg cov timtswv lug qha tej kws yuav muaj lug sai sai yaav tom ntej rua nwg cov tubkhai paub.”
Yexus has tas, “Mej ua tuab zoo noog kuv tej lug! Kuv tub yuav lug sai sai nuav! Tug kws ua lawv le tej lug kws sau rua huv phoo ntawv nuav yog tug kws tau nyob kaaj sab lug!”

Kuv yog Yauhaas, kuv tau nov hab kuv tau pum txhua tsaav yaam nuav. Thaus kuv nov hab kuv pum taag lawm, kuv txawm txhus caug ndlua ntawm tug timtswv ceebtsheej kws qha txhua yaam rua kuv txhais kutaw hab yuav pe nwg.

Tabsis tug timtswv ntawd has rua kuv has tas, “Koj tsi xob pe kuv! Kuv yog ib tug tubkhai ib yaam le koj hab ib yaam le koj cov kwvtij kws ua cov cev Vaajtswv lug, hab ib yaam le txhua tug kws ua lawv le tej lug kws sau rua huv phoo ntawv nuav xwb. Koj ca le pehawm Vaajtswv xwb!”
Hab tug timtswv has rua kuv has tas, “Koj tsi xob muab tej kws Vaajtswv qha rua huv phoo ntawv nuav npog ca, rua qhov tub yuav txug lub sijhawm kws muaj tej ntawd.
Tug kws ua phem yeej yuav ua phem moog le, tug kws ua qas yeej yuav ua qas moog le; tug kws ua zoo yeej yuav ua zoo moog le, hab tug kws dlawbhuv yeej yuav dlawbhuv moog le.”
Yexus has tas, “Mej ua tuab zoo noog kuv tej lug! Kuv tub yuav lug sai sai nuav! Kuv yuav coj kuv tej nqe zug lug, kuv yuav muab rua mej txhua tug lawv le teg num kws mej tau ua lug lawm.
Kuv yog Alafas hab Aumenkas, kuv yog lub hauvpaug hab yog lub ntsis.”
Cov kws ntxhua puab tej rig tsho huv lawm, yog cov kws nyob kaaj sab lug, puab muaj feem moog noj cov txiv kws muaj txujsa, hab muaj feem moog ntawm cov roojvaag moog rua huv lub nroog.

Tabsis cov tuabneeg kws ua phem ua qas, cov tuabneeg ua khawvkoob, cov tuabneeg kws ua kev nkauj kev nraug, cov tuabneeg tua tuabneeg, cov tuabneeg pe mlom, cov tuabneeg dlaag, tsi has tej lug kws puab has hab tej num kws puab ua, txhua tug puavleej yuav tau nyob saab ntug nroog nrau xwb.
“Kuv yog Yexus, kuv tub khaiv kuv tug timtswv lug qha tej nuav rua mej txhua tug huv tej pawg ntseeg lawm. Kuv yog Daviv caajceg, kuv yog lub nubqub kws ci ci thaus yuav kaaj ntug.”

Vaaj Ntsujplig hab tug Nkauj Nyaab has tas, “Ca le lug ntawm nuav!” Txhua tug kws nov lu lug ntawd yuavtsum teb has tas, “Ca le lug ntawm nuav!” Tug kws nqhes dlej ca le lug ntawm nuav; tug kws xaav haus ca le lug txais cov dlej cawm txujsa moog haus. Cov dlej nuav yog pub dlawb dlawb xwb tsi yuav nqe.

Kuv yog Yauhaas, kuv ceebtoom rua txhua tug kws nov tej lug kws Vaajtswv qha rua huv phoo ntawv nuav has tas: yog leejtwg ntxiv ib lu lug rua tej kws sau tseg rua huv phoo ntawv nuav lawm, Vaajtswv yuav muab tej sub tawg sub ntshaa kws has huv phoo ntawv nuav rua tug ntawd.

Hab yog leejtwg rhu tej lug kws Vaajtswv qha rua huv phoo ntawv nuav ib lus tawm, Vaajtswv yuav tsi pub tsob txiv cawm txujsa kws yog nwg feem rua nwg noj, hab Vaajtswv yuav tsi pub lub chaw huv lub Nroog Dlawbhuv rua nwg nyob. Kuv tub has txug tej ntawd rua huv phoo ntawv nuav lawm.
Tug kws ua timkhawv txug tej nuav, nwg has tas, “Kuv tub yuav lug sai sai nuav!” Thov kuas muaj lawv le ntawd. Tswv Yexus, thov koj ca le lug!
Thov tug Tswv Yexus foom koob moov rua mej txhua tug.
